page.title: 12A Policeman's Day
page.content:
{Marlow}Police station is in Dean Street and it is not very big. There are four shifts. In the morning all the staff go into the briefing room to be told what to do. Some people stay in the police station and others walk the streets or go in the cars to see if there are any strange goings on. The Panda car is the smallest vehicle and it is a Ford Escort. In the boot there are cones, brooms and signs. The Panda car has a flashing blue light but no siren.
The traffic car is a Ford Granada. In the boot there are fluorescent jackets, brooms, first aid kits, wellington boots, blankets and cones. The Police station has four cells and they get the food for the inmates from the Two Brewers Public House.
